name: Rakshak
desc: A secure Spring Boot-based system for managing criminal records, built for authorized personnel like police, jailers, and judges.

name: Currency-Converter
desc: A React.js web app for real-time currency conversion using a reliable live API. Provides a clean UI and accurate exchange rates.

name: Space-Craft-Interio
desc: A modern interior design portfolio website built using Next.js and PostgreSQL, allowing users to browse curated design collections and book their preferred styles seamlessly.

name: Yatra-Ed
desc: A seamless consultancy platform powered by Next.js and Supabase, helping students find the right college and course while offering expert admission guidance.

name: Kaarya--Task-Manager
desc: A Node.js-based web application designed to help users manage their daily to-do tasks in an organized and efficient manner.

name: Keylogger
desc: A Flask-based web keylogger that captures and logs user keystrokes in real-time through a simple HTML and JavaScript frontend.
